title: Lovely apartment for sale in Dehiwala
details:
3 Bedrooms - 3 Bathrooms - Elevator - Swimming pool - Air conditioning - Maid's quarters/Laundry room - Balconies for all rooms - Private Generator - 24-hour security - CCTV cameras - Furnished/Unfurnished - Gymnasium - Rooftop terrace - Convenient location - Private generator

Furnished - LKR 27 million/-
Unfurnished - LKR 25 million/-

Primarily located in Dehiwala, this lovely 3-bedroom apartment is spacious and has a very welcoming ambience. For those who wish to rent out a furnished apartment, is a great opportunity because all the furniture is both comfortable and stylish which can suite anyone’s taste. There is air conditioning throughout the house including fans which is perfect for anyone who needs sanctuary from the humid weather. The apartment complexes gymnasium is fully equipment and is located on the rooftop which includes a terrace which is a perfect space for hosting small parties or gatherings. Dehiwala is home to a fantastic array of services & amenities in the immediate area: Banks (Seylan bank, Sampath bank, BOC, Pan Asia Bank, HNB, NDB, Peoples Bank, Commercial Bank, HSBC, NSB, DFCC), hospitals (Vasana hospital, Nawaloka Medical Center, Navajeevana Healthcare Centre, Physio Medicare), supermarkets (Cargills Food City, Arpico Super center), shopping, restaurants, cafés and bars. The area is also home to many great schools and educational facilities and has convenient access to places such as Karagampitiya, Mount Lavinia and Wellawatta.
